Reviews.Title: Best battery and a lot of power
Reviews.Author: Juan A.
Reviews.Content: best smartphone i've had...works perfectly in Venezuela...As a review using mo0re than 39 apps and lots of video streaming it holds a great battery power....lasts a lot and i have NOTHING TO COMPLAIN.....well the camera is not the best....but still is perfect smartphone....

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Pusa
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone. This phone works very well and smartly. In fact since I bought it I have loved using it to surf the web than using my ipad. The camera is very clear. Sound quality excellent. Processor speed is superb. I love Sony. Sony has finally given the winning blow to other phones. Again, this seller is the best I have encountered on Amazon. They shipped item on one day shipping and I received this phone in less than 20 hours after placing order. Best seller on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very well-designed piece of kit.
Reviews.Author: Topher
Reviews.Content: This is a great device, to be sure.  It was my upgrade from a Samsung GS3, and I use it primarily for the business I run out of my home.  I would recommend it for anyone who uses a phone for business, as its quick, stable, and altogether a superb piece of equipment.  The Galaxy series of phone from Samsung pales in comparison, so Sony hit this product out of the ballpark.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase Good Phone No Regrets
Reviews.Author: LCRD1
Reviews.Content: Coming from Xperia Z phone i can say the following.-Robust, elegant and very well finished phone,  improved compared to Z, and superior to any phone in market.-Improved battery life  now i get at least 12 or 13 hours  talking, using LTE wifi or bluetooth during the day.  For GPS use it decreases to 7, 8 hours of use.-Its a shame the phone is big due to the camera sensor, i better would  bet for big screen instead. Rear Camera is absolutely perfect for normal light conditions, very, very poor performance on low light conditions (Using superior auto or manual). i know about cheap phones doing a great job with this issue, front camera seems to be underdog compared to its predecesor Xperia Z,  pics always blurry.  Neither sony nor any phone factory understand that megapixels does not matter if you are going to get blurry pictures, better keep doing 1mp cameras.-Sound quality much better than Xperia Z due to new location, but not loud as other brands.-Phone with no lag, runs very fast.-Screen Absolutely nice until you see s4, but remember real life images are not so vivid as displayed in those led phones hehe.-Plug protectors design improved compared to Z-The only thing i could miss from Z is its light weight, Z1 is heavyIf you look for top-notch camera android smartphone, go for other brand. Sony still has to fix and grow in this subject.If you look for durable, waterproof, fast android smarthphone don't look around Z1 is the choice

Reviews.Title: Love it too much
Reviews.Author: Yanan Ramirez "Yanan"
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone/camera that works underwater, when you unbox this great phone you will be noticed that seller includes an american / central-american energy adapter ( white color ), then this box includes magnetic charger,headset,pc cable, normal charger cable and headset gum replacements, it's a little heavy but it looks beatifull, stylish and good design are things that characterize Sony.You will be happy with this phone, then i recomend some 64 GB mSD class 10 card, and some protection layer that protects body and screen. After all this your phone will be safe from scratchs and if you use some case would be safe from drops.PD: Works in Costa Rica.

Reviews.Title: More than delighted
Reviews.Author: Luis Madriz
Reviews.Content: Pros:Spectacular camera. I was a little worried because of bad reviews on this matter, but the camera quality succeeds my expectations, except on low-light scenarios.Feels good to the touch. This cellphone is built from strong, solid, materials.The screen resolution is impressive. It could be compared with state-of-the-art LED TVs.Cons:As mentioned above, the quality of pics on low-light places is not as good as in other scenarios. Not bad, could be better.General issue of all smartphones: battery life. I highly encourage users to upgrade the default OS (4.2) and turn the NFC option off to increase battery life. I used the phone for one day with those features on and the battery ran dry in 3/4s of a day.Bear in mind this phone comes with a UK BS 1363 power outlet, but no adapter is included and I find the charging time via PC rather slow.Forgot to mention that it works flawlessly in Costa Rica, using Kolbi.

Reviews.Title: Great smart phone.
Reviews.Author: Warren Mc Kain
Reviews.Content: Made my purchase here, an I have not regretted it yet. This phone is truly a beast. Moves buttery smooth, camera is amazing ( admittedly not the best but still great experience). Upgraded from an s3 an I have no regrets. Also I think it's important to say that you get a charging dock with it so worry not about purchasing one. Was always a big Sony fan,they just took a while to catch back up but it feels good again to be a proud owner of a Sony phone.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: franklin
Reviews.Content: excellent product, as shown in the page, the clearance time was amazing too ... highly responsible supplier, blindly recommend. .

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Joseovallos
Reviews.Content: My personal opinion is that this cell phone is simply the best, I it recommend 100 % many criticize the chamber, but this detail sera promptly solved with an update

Reviews.Title: idioma
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: all was right, but the idioma of the cell is in chinesse, there should be in english or spanish, thanks.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Buy!!
Reviews.Author: Mark H.
Reviews.Content: Arrived in perfect condition.. No complaints :)They should probably consider responding more to customer's inquiring since I had initially inquired some things and hasn't gotten and response.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Christopher R Clayborn
Reviews.Content: Purchased from Wireless everythingThe phone performs exactly as expected, is exactly as described, and arrived the day it should have.My only concern is the way it was shipped.  The phone box is maybe 4x5x2 (not sure of exact dimensions), but it was shipped in a HUGE fedex sealed carton.  I mean 3 or 4 phone boxes could have fit inside.  This would not be an issue if enough padding was provided in the box to secure the actual phone box..  But, the box only had one little lousy piece of brown "packing paper", maybe 8.5x11, crumbled inside...Result that the phone box bounced/slid/moved around VERY freely inside the much larger fedex box...I consider myself lucky it was not damaged in transit....If I had to buy again I'd find another vendor because that is not a risk I am willing to take a second time...  For a $500 product I expect it to be packed a lot better...so it doesn't shake like a maraca...

Reviews.Title: In love with this phone!
Reviews.Author: Elena Chijik
Reviews.Content: This is my favorite phone! Beautiful, elegant, large screen, fast, superb colors, best camera, waterproof, fun, fun, fun!!!! Oh and battery life is so much better than my Iphone 4s. Love love love Xperia Z1!!!!

Reviews.Title: a good job
Reviews.Author: Ahmed Mostafa
Reviews.Content: A had a very good experience with them they were very helpful and when I had a problem their response was amazing realy I appreciate what they did with me and I think this will not be the last time to deal with them thank you

Reviews.Title: This is a very nice cell phone!
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: The phone is great, the delivery was fast, and everything went well with the phone.We bought the phone for my nephew and he loved it! He took the phone to Bolivia where he lives and he was able to activate it with no problem. He loves the phone!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Pedro Cordeiro Neves
Reviews.Content: The phone is very good, nice and matches all the characteristics of the ad. I really liked to have bought it.

Reviews.Title: Camera way too disappointing
Reviews.Author: Zhexuan Wang "zee"
Reviews.Content: The phone looks great, all functions seem to be OK. However, the camera only looks good without zoom in. Compared with Nexus 5, which zooms up to 4 times and still sharp, this Z1 camera's zoom in function is simply cheating. It magnifies the image 4 times without re-focusing. Any image under zoom in is blurry. The price is too high for such a built-in camera.Other comments: the battery lasts 2 days, which is good. But it increased the size dramatically, so compared with Nexus 5, this phone it too big in hand. The external charging function is a good feature.If you want a good phone and never owned Nexus 5, you should change your focus from this point.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Joey "JoeT"
Reviews.Content: I had the Xperia z previously and this Z1 one is even better. The processor is faster and the battery lasts longer. Its a bit thicker because the camera is better. I like that the headphone jack no longer needs to be covered. Im still waiting for the magnetic charger to arrive, but i like that I won't have to open the USB port when I charge this phone. Frankly, the screen is fragile and if you crack it, it won't work anymore. As much as I hate having a case on such a great looking phone, its a necessity because you will drop it.

Reviews.Title: NEW??? BUT SEALS BROKEN!!!
Reviews.Author: Christian W.
Reviews.Content: I bought the Sony Xperia Z1 C6903 from 'WorldWide Distributors'. When it arrived the seals on the box were already broken and the English Startup Guide was missing from inside. This made me wonder whether my product was actually new, considering I paid full price for a new phone. This is quite inconvenient and displeasing to me.

Reviews.Title: Quality phone.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Its taking me a while to learn all the differences between my old Samsung 111 and the Z1.  As I learn to use all the features I am liking it better and better.

Reviews.Title: The best smartphone
Reviews.Author: Ronald Sousa
Reviews.Content: Greetings.I did a market research and I'm definitely convinced that this is best cell phone with the best price. It's fast, waterproof, it has a big screen, a awesome camera and it's technological. I recommend this product.Thanks again or everything.

Reviews.Title: Great phone and everything else
Reviews.Author: Laoblue
Reviews.Content: Had this for nearly 6 months.  Pictures are really great too.  But, the Z2 is better, because it is thinner, larger screen, stereo speakers...however, the Z1 is adequate and looks good, just a little heavy and big for smaller hands.

Reviews.Title: Best smartphone I ever had.
Reviews.Author: Czobor Raul Nicolae
Reviews.Content: As the headline says I love it, the way ot looks the way it works, even the way it sounds and I have had a bunch of smartphones to date but this one is the best by far.

Reviews.Title: excelent phone (telefono excelente)
Reviews.Author: Elquyn Gomez
Reviews.Content: i just received mine yesterday, quick to say that checked what comes with it: it brings a stereo headphones ,a usb cable, the magnetic charguer ,wich it looks like a dock for the phone, this magnetic charger has in one side the dock for charge and in the other side a usb plug, but this plug is to be attached to a wall connection to be charged, the connection it's international voltage type, so you would have to buy a conversor to charge the phone in your domestic power service. when you turn on the phone the default language its chinesse i think, but has a first start menu wich lets you change it for english at least. comes with 4.3 android, i tested camera ok, music ok, earphones jack ok, microsd sd, simcard ok, not yet underwater test, the android system runs smooth and better than my previous SG3, that's all till here.lo recibi ayer, lo prendi todo excelente, viene con los audifonos, un cable usb, y un dock para carga magnetica, que basicamente es un dock en un extremo pero en el otro tiene un cable usb que va  pegado a un cargador de corriente que no es convencional por estos lados (me refiero a Venezuela) hay que comprar un convertidor que permita cambiar la conexion para poder cargarlo a la toma de corriente de su hogar, tambien se puede cargar con el cable usb pero tarda algo mas, al encenderlo la primera ves, veras que trae lenguaje chino y que por lo menos se puede cambiar a ingles, luego nuevamente a español, viene con android 4.3, revise el slot para sim: ok, para micro: ok ,el usb:ok la camara: ok, no lo he metido bajo el agua aun, lo tengo en Venezuela corriendo la sim de movilnet y hasta ahora todo bien, eso es lo que puedo decir hasta aca

Reviews.Title: Sony is the best
Reviews.Author: Jhonny
Reviews.Content: 2Gb Ram, Quad Core 2.2 Ghz, Android 4.3, 20.7Mp camera, is the best phone ever. beautiful, elegant, big, but not to much... is PERFECT

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: helen castillo
Reviews.Content: excellent .. I love this phone is everything I expected, the gorgeous design. a little heavy but nothing to envy of other phones..spere mucho tiempo para tener este telefono.. ahora que lo tengo, me encanta, no puedo quejarme de nada.. me encanto.

Reviews.Title: A mobile that exceeds most of my expectations
Reviews.Author: Sohom Chatterjee
Reviews.Content: Display, finish, camera, sound.... - this mobile comes with unbeatable experience.Lacking is a good flash, that i know thats too much expectation from a mobile.

Reviews.Title: Great phone....
Reviews.Author: Christopher Y.
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. 20.7 megapixel camera and waterproof.  Those were to the two main features that attracted me to this phone.  The speaker on the phone is not that great, but the quality and build of the phone makes up for that one potential downfall.  I had this phone for about 3 months now and I don't regret buying it at all.  Sony did a great job with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Display Manufacturing Quality Issues
Reviews.Author: E. Montgomery Recht
Reviews.Content: So basically bottom line is the it's great phone (the best Android phone i've probably had), but then there's the issue of screen quality.  Basically I've been through two Z1's, the first one display stopped working, and then I received a second one with a cracked screen.  Worse part was Sony was non-helpful on support side, basically doesn't want to admit that there's a product quality issue.

Reviews.Title: One of the best smartphones
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Pita "Gabriel Pita"
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Great battery life, 2 days on regular use (calls, IM, social networks, some photos & videos) and 1 full day on heavy use (streaming, web browsing) and that's without using stamina mode.- Fast and responsive UI thanks to the Quad-core processor and 2GB RAM.- Great camera, could be better in low light conditions but still better than almost every other smartphone, if they can update the firmware to avoid the overprocessing of the images it could be the best smartphone camera.- Great build quality.- Water & dust proof.Cons:- No KitKat yet.- The Z1's screen claims to be scratch proof, but it comes with a screen protector pre-installed that is easily scratched (I already scratched mine just by putting the phone in my jean's pocket), You can remove this screen protector but you lose the sony logo because is burned in it.Hardware wise, there are few phones that can match the Z1, the display might not be the shiniest one out there but i think it reflects true color and not some saturated version of an image. Some people has complaints about the viewing angles but i can't see what is the big buzz about that.In short, The Z1 is currently one of the best smartphones of the market, Sony is going in the right direction.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cel, but incomplete order
Reviews.Author: Aaron Asanza
Reviews.Content: the cel is perfect, it's the c6903 as it describes, but in the box i diden't get the magnetic charging dock as they they said it comes as a complete set...

Reviews.Title: Great piece of work !
Reviews.Author: Elad Volfin
Reviews.Content: This is not my first one, but it sure is one of the best ! If you are still considering, don't... just buy.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT!!! RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL GOMEZ
Reviews.Content: EXCELENT!!! RECOMMENDED, VERY GOOD CELL PHONE BRAND NEW IT'S WHAT I NEEDED SERIOUS SELLER AND RESPONSIBLE BUY SAFE DO NOT MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY

Reviews.Title: wonderful product by Sony
Reviews.Author: Henry E. Vogeler S.
Reviews.Content: This Product is perfect, powerful, amazing cellular, Thanks Sony for make happy with this sensational cellular phone. I Will recommend for every one that want a great cellular.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone Horrible Camera
Reviews.Author: Tablets and Technologies
Reviews.Content: Camera is horrible. You would think that since it has a 20MP camera that it would rock. But Nope beyond horrible fuzzy pictures are all that came from this phone. We returned and got a refund.

ProductInfo.Name: Sony Xperia Z1 C6903 (Honami) 16GB Black Factory Unlocked International Version No Warranty 20mp Camera 5" 4G LTE 800 / 850 / 900 / 1700 / 1800 / 1900 / 2100 / 2600
